description.p: Noeud knime permettant d'include/exclure une serie de VCF versus un VCF (database). Une liste de tags peut etre specifiee pour copier les tags INFO de la database vers les vcf.

column.name: vcfIn1
column.label: VCF file
column.description: A Variant Call Format (VCF) file. Can be gzipped or bgzipped

column.name: vcfIn2
column.label: Indexed VCF file
column.description: A Variant Call Format (VCF) file. Can be gzipped or bgzipped

property.name: altInIndex
property.label: picky about ALT
property.description: ALL user ALT alleles must be present in VCF database

property.name: tagPrefix
property.label: Tag Prefix
property.description: On peeking, prefix all tags with this prefix
